text: (manitarkale!) Unkalukku munnirunta ettanaiyo vakuppinarai avarkal ceytu kontirunta aniyayattin karanamaka niccayamaka nam alittuvittom. Avarkalitam anuppappatta (nam) tutarkal telivana attatcikalaiye kontu vantanar. Eninum (avarrai) avarkal nampaveyillai. Kurram ceyyum marra makkalukku ivvare nam kuli kotu(ttut tanti)ppom
